contextDescription: Design and architecture of robust, secure, and scalable web infrastructures, focusing on server configurations, network optimization, and high availability systems
learningObjectives: Design a one server web infrastructure hosting a website
Explain the role of each component in web infrastructure
Identify single points of failure in system designs
Implement solutions for high availability and fault tolerance
Design secure web infrastructures with appropriate firewalls
Configure load balancers for distributed traffic handling
Implement database replication for data redundancy
Design scalable web infrastructures for growing traffic demands
Explain the purpose of monitoring and how it's implemented
Understand domain name configuration and DNS records
Identify security issues in web infrastructure design
prerequisites: Basic understanding of web servers and databases
Familiarity with Linux server administration concepts
